byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley reported from New Hartford, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Death of 19-year-old Lucas Leonard and assault of his 17-year-old brother Christopher during rite at Word of Life Christian Church in New Hartford, NY, offers surrounding community glimpse into secretive sect; brothers were savagely beaten by church members in ritual intended to make them confess their sins; teenagers' parents, Bruce T and Deborah Leonard, are arrested and charged with manslaughter, and several other church members are also taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: Six people have been arrested so far in the beating of Lucas Leonard, 19, who died from his injuries, and Christopher Leonard, 17, who remains in serious condition.

headline.main: Glimpses Inside Secretive Sect After Killing at Upstate New York Church
